actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to designate the first week in November of each year as "National Art Week."

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the first week in November as "National Art Week", and calls upon the people of the United States and interested groups and organizations to observed such week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to designate the first week in November of each year as "National Art Week."
